Tower Shield.Requirement: Level 4, 3 Might, Training in Shields, Tower Shield Feat

Punch.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 4, you can move 3 more meters this turn and you can continue your movement if you already moved.

Club.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 8, the attack ignores target's Defense (as if it were 0).

Dagger.Effect: Critical Strike - on melee attacks, if you roll 6 on the main roll, deal an extra 1d6 damage.

Mace.Effect: Ignores resistance to physical damage. If all dice rolled on the base attack are 1, each counts as 4 damage.

Hand Axe.Effect: Critical Strike - on melee attacks, if you rolled a 11 or 12 on the die, heal for 1 health (against a Worthy Enemy). Works even when thrown.

Hand Hammer.Effect: On melee attacks, 6 counts as 7 on the base rolls.

Flail.Effect: You can choose to deal Smash damage instead of Pierce. If you roll less than 3 on the d12, it counts as 3.

Shortsword.Effect: If the target's armor is 2 or less, attacks ignore armor.
Shortsword.Alternatives: Falchion, Sabre, Scimitar variant, Arming Sword

Scimitar.Special: You are more appreciated if you pronounce it as 'Skimitar'
Scimitar.Effect: If you roll 1 on the damage die, reroll the die and keep the new result.

Rapier.Effect: If your other hand is empty, you have 1 extra movement Speed in combat.

Cleaver.Effect: The first Flank attack with a Cleaver each turn deals 1 extra damage.
Cleaver.Notes: You need to be Trained either in Throwing Weapons or Cleavers specifically to throw this properly (to be considered Trained in Throwing Cleavers).

Warglaive.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 12, the weapon bounces to attack another chosen Unit within 4 meters for 1d12 + Your Dexterity Damage (against its Defense).
Warglaive.Notes: You need to be trained either in Throwing Weapons or War Glaives specifically to throw this properly (to be considered Trained in Throwing War Glaives). The effect applies both to throwing it and attacking with it melee. The effect applies even to the bounce attack, so it can keep bouncing as long as you keep rolling 12!

Greatclub.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 4 and 4, the target must pass a Might Check or be Stunned.

Warhammer.Effect: Your first attack with this weapon on the first round of combat ignores the target's Defense.

Longsword.Effect: Can be wielded either as a 1-Handed (for 1d10 damage) or 2-Handed weapon (for 1d12 + 3 damage).
Longsword.Notes: You only need to be Trained in 1-Handed or 2-Handed weapons to wield this weapon in both ways.

Greatsword.Effect: Critical Strike - if all three d6 are 6, deal another 3d6 damage!

Quarterstaff.Effect: If you are wearing no armor, you have +1 Defense against melee weapon attacks.
Quarterstaff.Notes: A Quarterstaff is a wooden weapon masterfully crafted for physical combat; it's not a mage's walking stick!

Battle Axe.Effect: Critical Strike - for each 11 and 12 rolled on the base dice, heal for 1 health (against Worthy Enemies).

Scythe.Effect: Instead of attacking, you can just deal 8 damage to all Units around you (against their Defense).

Pike.Effect:
2 meters range.
Even if you are not Trained in Throwing Weapons (or Pikes specifically), you can throw this and it's base damage is just 1d12 Damage + your Might.
If you are, however, Trained in Throwing Weapons (or Pikes specifically), the Throwing damage remains the same (1d12 + 3 + your Might).

Halberd.Effect: Has +1d6 damage against Large or larger enemies.

Katana.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll the same number on both dice, deal 1d8 extra damage.

Trident.Effect: If you moved at least 3 meters in a straight line and then attacked, the attack gains +1d4 damage.

Pickaxe.Effect: Deals +1d4 damage against humanoids wearing shields.

Whip.Effect: Deals +1d4 damage against unarmored or lightly armored creatures.

Longbow.Effect: Critical Strike - deal +1d8 extra damage if you roll 8.

Heavy Crossbow.Downside: You must use either 0.5 Actions or all of your possible movement to reload the Heavy Crossbow before you can use it again.

Heavy Gun.Effect: Instead of attacking, you can spend 5 ammo to deal 4 damage to all creatures in a 3x3 area (directly) in front of you.
Heavy Gun.Downside: You must always spend 0.5 Actions to reload the gun before you can attack or do its special ability again.

Sling.Downside: Carrying the perfect rocks for the Sling reduces your movement speed by 1 meter.
Sling.Notes: Yes, and you can attack 3 times per turn with the same sling. Abilities that require you to make a 1-Handed weapon attack will still take 0.5 Actions, even if the normal Sling attack would take 0.33 Actions

Light Crossbow.Downside: You must use either 0.25 Actions or half of your possible movement to reload the Light Crossbow before you can use it again.

Handgun.Effect: You have no penalties for melee attacks with the Handgun.
Handgun.Downside:
The half-range of the Handgun is 5 meters.
You must use either 0.25 Actions or half of your possible movement to reload the Handgun before you can use it again.

Blowgun.Effect: If the target has below 50% Health, deals 1 extra Poison damage which ignores Defense.
